org.kaaproject.kaa.client.channel

Interface TransportConnectionInfo

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    GenericTransportInfo, IPTransportInfo

    public interface TransportConnectionInfo
    Interface for server information. Used by KaaDataChannel and KaaChannelManager

    • Method Summary

      int getAccessPointId()
      Retrieves the access point id (operations/bootstrap server id)

      Retrieves serialized connection properties.

      • getServerType

        ServerType getServerType()
        Retrieves the channel's server type (i.e. OPERATIONS or BOOTSTRAP).

        the channel's server type.

        Retrieves the TransportProtocolId.
        Returns:
        the transport protocol id.

      • getConnectionInfo

        byte[] getConnectionInfo()
        Retrieves serialized connection properties. Serialization may be specific for each transport protocol implementation.
        Returns:
        serialized connection properties
